content: X-EMTC P-clip with X-C nail Metal conduit strap with pre-mounted concrete nail for use with powder actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Very fast – for cost-efficient conduit, cable or pipe fastenings Bracing rib for high rigidity and a tight, secure hold on flexible conduits Applications Fastening flexible and rigid electrical conduits, cables, water and heating pipes, injection hoses ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Masonry (solid clay brick), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Approvals | N/A | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 226906 - Conduit clip standard X-EMTC 3/8 C27 - Package Size 100 pc - 226905 - Conduit clip standard X-EMTC 1/2 C27 - Package Size 100 pc - 226904 - Conduit clip standard X-EMTC 3/4 C27 - Package Size 100 pc -
